item.title: 🎾🤖 Tennalytix (2/5): Track Pixel Positions Through Deep Learning
item.description: How can we track the player pixel locations in a video? How can we track the tennis ball pixel locations? And where can we deploy our deep learning models?

item.title: 🎾💻 Tennalytix (3/5): Create Tkinter GUI To Manually Overwrite Predictions
item.description: How do we build a tool into which we load model predictions and can build some overwrite functionalities? Introduction In this third blog post, I will describe how I built a user interface with the Python interface library Tkinter.

item.title: 🎾📊 Tennalytix (5/5): Visualising Insights using Plotly Dash
👨‍💼➡👨‍💻 Why I Quit Business For A Computer Science Career
🚀 Deploy ML model through CI/CD into Docker Container
🤓☝ Software Engineering Best Practices For Data Scientists
item.description: Did you ever need to make some changes to an ML project that you worked on a long time ago? Very likely it was not a pleasant experience.
